alert.note: Alert for Fauquier; Rappahannock; Warren (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 07 at 1:01PM EDT until September 07 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM EDT FOR EASTERN WARREN...NORTH CENTRAL RAPPAHANNOCK AND NORTHWESTERN FAUQUIER COUNTIES... At 101 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Front Royal, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Front Royal, Linden, Hume, Chester Gap, Glen Echo, Huntly, Arco, Blue Mountain, Howellsville, Markham, and Ashville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
